page.title: 10INFORMATION SYSTEMS
page.content:
The Library Van comes to{Thornton {Watlass} village once a fortnight.It stops at three places in the village; near the Post Office,up at the top of the village and in the Big Yard.About twenty_five people go to the library van and the librarians give out about one-hundred books each time they come. The libary van goes to{Clifton, Thirn and{Low Ellington.}They have a selection of books both for children and adults.The books are in different sections.
There is also a Library Van which comes to the School once a term. It provides a special service for Schools. It has only children's books on board. Each child chooses about five books which are pooled in class and taken home to be read.
